h4.TurnOffPowerOnSelf (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_TurnOffPowerOnSelf_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: powerName (string)*
Turns off the power with the passed in name when it's running on the entity itself


h4.TurnOnPowerOnSelf (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_TurnOnPowerOnSelf_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: powerName (string)*
Turns off the power with the passed in name when it's running on the entity itself


h4.QueuePowerOnEnt (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_QueuePowerOnEnt_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: entsIn (Entity Array)*
*Parameter 2: powerName (string)*
Uses the power of the passed in name on an ent array
NOTE: the critter needs to already have this power
NOTE: you can only use a power on one entity, so passing in multiple to this function will cause an error


h4.QueuePowerOnEntPos (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_QueuePowerOnEntPos_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: entsIn (Entity Array)*
*Parameter 2: powerName (string)*
Uses the power of the passed in name on the position of the entity in the entArray
NOTE: the critter needs to already have this power
NOTE: you can only use a power on one entity, so passing in multiple to this function will cause an error


h4.UsePowerOnEntArray (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_UsePowerOnEntArray_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: entsIn (Entity Array)*
*Parameter 2: powerName (string)*
Uses the power of the passed in name on an ent array
NOTE: the critter needs to already have this power
NOTE: you can only use a power on one entity, so passing in multiple to this function will
cause an error


h4.UsePowerOnPoint (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_UsePowerOnPoint_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: powerName (string)*
*Parameter 2: matIn (Location)*
Uses the power with the passed in name on a point
NOTE: the entity needs to already have this power


h4.UsePowerOnSelf (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_UsePowerOnSelf_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: powerName (string)*
Uses the power with the passed in name on the entity itself
NOTE: the entity needs to already have this power
